ISSUE.TITLE: Rename "Add a new checkout value" to "Add a new checkout attribute value" on the edit checkout attribute details page
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Go to Edit checkout attribute details page 2. In the Attribute values panel the wrong button name as well as the editing window name

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #5058 The 'hide/show fields' javascript code moved from _CreateOrUpdate.Info.cshtml to _CreateOrUpdate.Display.cshtml view

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4925 Renamed "Add a new checkout value" to "Add a new checkout attribute value" on the edit checkout attribute details page
